name: AddUserToRole
description:
Adds a user to a specific role in Datadog.

Use this tool to add a user to a specific role in Datadog's system. It is called when you need to assign user permissions via roles.

parameters.name: role_unique_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the role you want to assign the user to.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the role.

parameters.name: user_unique_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier representing the user to be added to the role.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.

parameters.name: users_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of resource as 'users'. Always use 'users'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: role_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the role.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the role.

parameters.name: data.id
parameters.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier that represents the user.
